valid_articles.Title: Google ending Notes on Search today
valid_articles.Description: Google is ending its experiment with Notes on Search. The feature, which was part of Google Search Labs, allowed users to add notes to search results. Google says that it has seen in its research that people want to hear from others like them and Notes was an exploration into that.

valid_articles.Title: Investigation: Apple, Nvidia, Anthropic, and others trained their AI on a dataset that contained YouTube video transcripts, including from the WSJ, MrBeast, MIT
valid_articles.Description: A new investigation has found that Apple, Nvidia, Anthropic, and other companies trained their AI models on a dataset that contained YouTube video transcripts, including from the Wall Street Journal, MrBeast, and MIT. The dataset, which was created by Google, was not intended to be used for training AI models.
